long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gitlab++ is a utility tool that brings draggable tiles to Gitlab Boards

Inspiration came up to me after using Jira for years and noticing that when clicking on Gitlab cards, it would only display a sidebar with limited information.

Setup:
Generate a Gitlab Access Token (with at least API read capabilities).
Head to the extension option page and let it guide you!
This extension stores your Access Token on your local browser, NOT online.

Features:
- Click on any issue card in the Gitlab Board view to create a popup with the Issue title + description
- Click on an issue card again to remove the popup
- Use the ESC key to close all popups
- Popups are draggable across the page, allowing you to move them around and organize them as you see fit

In the future:
- Add more info on the tile
- Add way to organize tiles

We are not affiliated, associated, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency.
